nodes.bodyText: It feels very weird to say the data is invalid but process it anyway.  Kind of have to with the way gossip works but still awkward. Just something to ponder in the back of our minds about how it could be done better.

yeah - it's not great.  i was thinking of reworking the API to surface some kind of GossipMessage object with some API methods like doNotRegossip, regossip or something but I felt like it wasn't worth digging into right now.
